Find the R-project root directory to simplify file path designations.
```{r}
root.dir <- rprojroot::find_root("lgss.Rproj")
```

Load in data table
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

site.condition <- read.csv(file.path(root.dir, "data/site_condition", "site_condition_BoxWhisker.csv"))

site.condition %>%
  mutate(LG_reg_v2 = forcats::fct_reorder(LG_reg_v2, COND, mean)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(LG_reg_v2, COND)) + 
  geom_boxplot()

# For reordering by name (enter in list c())
# site.condition %>%
#   mutate(LG_reg_v2 = factor(LG_reg_v2, levels = c())) %>%
#   ggplot(aes(LG_reg_v2, COND)) + 
#   geom_boxplot()

site.condition %>%
  mutate(LG_reg_v2 = forcats::fct_reorder(LG_reg_v2, LU_pct_nat_wetlnd, mean)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(LG_reg_v2, LU_pct_nat_wetlnd)) + 
  geom_boxplot() 

site.condition %>%
  mutate(LG_reg_v2 = forcats::fct_reorder(LG_reg_v2, LU_pct_nat_wetlnd, mean)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(LG_reg_v2, LU_pct_nat_wetlnd)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + geom_jitter(aes(color = COND))

site.condition %>%
  mutate(LG_reg_v2 = forcats::fct_reorder(LG_reg_v2, COND, mean)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(LG_reg_v2, COND)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + geom_jitter(aes(color = LU_pct_nat_wetlnd))

```
